about_the_game:
When you, the sole heir to a noble family and estate, are rudely awoken after a night of revelry, you can barely grasp the extent of the troubles awaiting you. Confronted with a dire ultimatum, you must choose: flee your ancestral home, leaving it under the dubious care of your deceitful uncle, or face arrest by the Capitano of the Guard for a crime you don't recall committing.

Embark on a captivating journey through the illustrious kingdom of Antara to seek justice and uncover the truth. Evade relentless pursuers, duel daring bandits, seek guidance at the temple of the Goddess, and unravel a nefarious scheme to clear your name. Or perhaps, choose to ride off into the sunset with a newfound love, leaving all your troubles behind. The choice is yours!

Arderico’s Journey is an interactive fiction adventure that draws inspiration from the fascinating realms of fantasy tabletop RPGs and classic gamebooks, enriched with dynamic character interactions, meaningful choices, and content that reacts to your decisions.

Game Features:

  • Choose Your Own Adventure: Every decision shapes your journey through a world filled with intrigue and danger.
  • Lighthearted Fantasy: Dive into a charming, yet thrilling narrative that blends elements of fantasy, adventure, as well as cloak-and-dagger.
  • Seamless Storytelling: Experience a book-like narrative - with its course directed by you!
  • Multiple Endings: Your choices may lead in very different directions. How will your story end?
  • Approximately 2 Hours of Gameplay (to One Ending): Perfect for an evening of escapade and exploration.
  • Meaningful Choices: Impact the storyline with decisions that matter.
  • Save System: Easily pick up where you left off without losing progress.
  • Throw the Dice: Overcome challenges with a chance based on your previous decisions.
  • Captivating Visuals: Over 50 beautiful illustrations crafted using generative art tools like Stable Diffusion, DALL-E, and Adobe Firefly.
  • Atmospheric Music: Immerse yourself in the sounds of adventure with a soundtrack composed by exceptionally talented royalty-free artists.
  • Languages: English & German

Dive into »Arderico's Journey,« a game where your choices don't just define the adventure - they define your destiny. Are you ready to explore your legacy? The path you choose is yours alone!

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game includes the following mature content:

Violence: 
Scenes of combat and graphic violence, including depictions of characters in life-threatening situations.

Threat and Coercion:
Intense scenes depicting characters in threatening or coercive scenarios.

Nudity: 
Artistic depictions of nudity, such as statues, intended to enhance the narrative's artistic depth. 

Dark Themes:
The storyline involves dark and mature themes, including death and conflict, which may be unsettling for some players.

This content is intended to provide an immersive and emotionally engaging experience for mature audiences.
